title: Twitter’s API Crackdown Will Hit More Than Just Bots
description: By shutting off its free API, the social network will stop researchers from getting access to crucial data to track hate speech and disinformation.

title: Eric Schmidt Is Building the Perfect AI War-Fighting Machine
description: The former Google CEO is on a mission to rewire the US military with cutting-edge artificial intelligence to take on China. Will it make the world safer?

title: India’s Government Wants Total Control of the Internet
description: The Modi administration keeps giving itself new powers, and Big Tech keeps giving in.
